config_ios.NSContactsUsageDescription: Save your phone's contact on your Cozy — this will facilitate sharing files with them.
config_ios.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Instantly back up and sync your photos and videos in your Cozy — so you never lose them.
config_ios.NSCameraUsageDescription: Take a photo and instantly back up it in your Cozy.
config_ios.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: need photo library access to save pictures there
